summary: The diff adds an entirely new app skeleton (React + Tailwind + auth/query hooks + empty backend actor) and introduces new page content. It does not demonstrate a refactor of an existing pageâ€™s markup while preserving all original content/attributes/behavior as required.

missing_requirements.requirement: Refactor the existing page markup into semantic HTML5 containers (at minimum <header>, <main>, <footer>) while keeping all existing content completely unchanged (text, attributes, links/URLs, form fields, inline styles), preserving behavior/hooks, and maintaining content order.
missing_requirements.reason: The diff shows only newly added files with newly written markup/content (e.g., new headings, paragraphs, footer attribution link) rather than restructuring an existing page while preserving its exact content, attributes, and behavior. No modified file shows an in-place semantic-wrapper refactor of existing markup.
evidence: frontend/src/App.tsx (new content: "Semantic HTML Structure", "Welcome", new descriptive paragraph, new caffeine.ai footer link)

hallucinated_features.description: Introduced a new React App component with new user-visible copy/content rather than preserving existing page content.
hallucinated_features.reason: BuildRequest prohibits changing/adding/removing any content; the diff adds new headings/paragraphs/footer attribution and dynamic year.
Backend work and new endpoints/features are non-goals; request was only semantic HTML restructuring.

hallucinated_features.description: Added Internet Identity authentication context/provider implementation.
hallucinated_features.reason: Authentication is a new app feature/behavior not requested by the semantic markup refactor.

hallucinated_features.description: Added React Query integration and actor/query hooks.
hallucinated_features.reason: Data fetching/query infrastructure is not part of the requested semantic HTML-only refactor and changes behavior/architecture scope.

hallucinated_features.description: Added/changed global styling system via Tailwind CSS directives, design tokens, and Tailwind configuration.
hallucinated_features.reason: Request explicitly forbids styling changes; adding Tailwind base/components/utilities and extensive CSS variables/configuration goes beyond semantic restructuring.
User-visible text/content changes are disallowed; the diff sets a specific title string.
